text: "Man on the Moon" is a 1992 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the second single from their 8th studio album Automatic for the People. It went to number 1 in Iceland, number 3 in Canada, number 8 in New Zealand, number 17 in Ireland, number 18 in the United Kingdom and number 30 in the United States. It pays tribute to Andy Kaufman. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe except as noted. title: Man on the Moon (song)
